"Using the FUN Shop!":
"Too many people nowadays don't know
about the FUN Shop!
Don't they know that using FUN deepens
your connections with other ARKS?

The FUN Shop is a great place to shop!
It sells all kinds of things that you won't
find anywhere else!

When I go to the FUN Shop, I like to..."
"Speak to Edouard, the FUN Shop attendant."
